IterativeActionsPrompt.Objective: Generate an XML representation for iterative actions based on the user-provided specifications.
IterativeActionsPrompt.SystemMessage: This prompt guides the creation of XML structures for actions that are repeated until a specified condition is satisfied, including various action types like filter, switch, classify, query, and mutate.

Step.Action: List actions and the conditions under which they repeat, specifying the action type.
Step.OutputFormat: <IterativeActions> <Action name="Action1" type="classify" repeatUntil="Condition1" /> <!-- Add more actions as needed --> </IterativeActions>

IterativeActionsPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing actions that are executed iteratively, with specified types.
